node.title: Tributes flow for 'legend' Dalaithngu as elders prepare to celebrate a giant of Yolngu culture
node.description: The actor who passed away on Monday is being hailed as "oneÂ of the greatest artists Australia has ever seen", as Yothu Yindi's Witiyana Marika says Arnhem Land elders will give "everything back to him what he has shared to every clan" in upcoming ceremonies.
node.content:
["As critics, political leaders, and fans publish tributes to actor\u00a0David Dalaithngu in the wake of his death on Monday,\u00a0Dalaithngu's family and friends are preparing\u00a0to celebrate his life\u00a0in\u00a0Arnhem Land.", "WARNING: Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander readers are advised this article contains images of a person who has died.", "The late actor's family has granted permission to use his image. For cultural reasons he is referred to as David Dalaithngu.", "The charisma, brilliance and prowess of Dalaithngu mesmerised audiences across the world in a career spanning five decades.", "Witiyana Marika, a Yolngu elder and Dalaithngu's\u00a0son by lore, has remembered his close relative as a man who shone on the screen through his connection to culture.", "\"He was a proud, black man,\" Mr Marika said.", "\"A proud black boy, becoming a famous \u2026 he was a fine Yolngu man, who came out from the bush.", "Celebrated roles in Australian films such as\u00a0Rabbit Proof Fence, Storm Boy, Crocodile Dundee, Walkabout, Charlie's Country\u00a0and The Tracker saw Dalaithngu gain\u00a0a\u00a0reputation as one of the country's greatest\u00a0actors.", "\"He had that kind of\u00a0special gift,\" Mr Marika said.", "\"He had\u00a0little knowledge of the white man way, but he knew \u2026 he can tell, through his eyes and through his feelings and through his thoughts. He seen that world.\"", "From a young age Dalaithngu was seen as the best traditional dancer in the Arnhem Land community \u2014 a talent\u00a0Mr Marika believed was key to his success on screen.", "\"It was the dancing, his dancing [that made him a great actor],\" he said.", "\"So that's how the world, the film industry, accepted him as a real traditional man that appeared on the screen.\"", "Mr Marika said ceremonies would\u00a0be held in the Arnhem Land community of Ramingining to commemorate Dalaithngu.", "\"All the clan's going to come around, come to Ramingining and celebrate the connection, celebrate the spirituality, celebrate him through the ritual \u2026\u00a0dance and all of that other stuff that can't be told,\" he said.", "\"We're just giving everything back to him what he has shared to every clan, nation, you know?\"", "
Tributes flow for a great artist
", "Indigenous Australians Minister Ken Wyatt has hailed\u00a0Dalaithngu as \"a giant of the screen, and a legend of the Yolngu people\".", "\"He took Aboriginal culture mainstream and global and, for this, his contribution to raising the profile of our people and Australia cannot be overstated.\"", "Northern Land Council\u00a0chairman Samuel Bush-Blanasi said\u00a0Dalaithngu would\u00a0be long remembered\u00a0\"for his songs, his dance, his artistic flair and his smile that invited you into his Aboriginal world\".", "\"His great contribution was bringing an understanding of Aboriginal values to a broad audience, for over 40 years; highlighting the importance of family, country and story-telling to Aboriginal Australians,\" he said.", "\"He was a true story-teller, using every opportunity to help Australians learn more about what is important to Australia's first people.", "\"We thank him for his legacy\u00a0 \u2026 this is a very sad time. We have lost a father, a grandfather and a great artist from Ramingining.\"", "Dalaithngu's contribution to Australian cinema was revolutionary, according to the Australian Academy of Cinema and Television Arts.", "\"Throughout his career [Dalaithngu]\u00a0continued to defy stereotypical representations to present a more complex Indigenous Australia on screen,\" the academy said.", "\"The impact of [his] screen presence cannot be underestimated.\"", "Hugh Jackman, who starred alongside Dalaithngu in the 2008 film\u00a0Australia, said he joined\u00a0people across the world\u00a0in mourning the actor's death.", "\"One of the great privileges of my life was to work with David on the movie Australia,\" Mr Jackman said.", "\"His contribution to film is immeasurable. From his cheeky laugh, to that mischievous glint in his eye and effortless ease in front of the camera \u2026 his\u00a0humanity is irreplaceable.\"", "Federal Opposition Leader Anthony Albanese paid tribute to the \"remarkable and powerful presence\" of Dalaithngu.", "\"We have lost a titan,\" Mr Albanese wrote.", "\"He walked in two worlds with grace, truth and humour.\"", "Dalaithngu was a man who \"loved his land and culture\", said South Australian Premier Steven Marshall , and \"one\u00a0of the greatest artists Australia has ever seen\".", "Northern Territory senator Malarndirri\u00a0McCarthy said Dalaithngu was \"transformed Australian cinema\" and \"never lost his connection to his language, song, law and country\".", "\"[He] will be greatly mourned,\" she said."]
